short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display domain favicons in Gmail list view

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows domain favicons in Gmail list view, ignoring certain common public email domains - at this time: gmail.com, outlook.com, hotmail.com, rogers.com. If this extension becomes popular I'll add a settings window to allow a custom blacklist.

If I forgot any major domains I'll update the version. Feel free to file a support ticket.
